actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 11 of title 38, United States Code, to provide full wartime benefits for extra-hazardous duty.

summary.text: Provides full wartime benefits to veterans for disabilities resulting from an injury or disease received in the line of duty (1) as a direct result of armed conflict and (2) while engaged in extrahazardous service (including service under conditions simulating war).

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 11 of title 38, United States Code, to provide full wartime benefits for extra-hazardous duty.
